metadata.synopsis: A couple of thugs are being briefed by their very corrupt Lawyer on how to not end up behind bars. This is the half-orc thug's one liner
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Wyrm's Rock Armoury (-9; 54; 207)- talk to the half orc

0.speaker: Civilian
0.text: Going to have to rob so many more houses to pay this bloody lawyer.

1.speaker: Civilian
1.text: Leave it out. I've got a trial coming up and I need to rememberise my lines.
1.context: NodeContext: gruff, dismissing player who has interrupted. 'Rememberise' is an attempt to say memorise that got mixed up with remember. Thinks it's the right word and should say it naturally.
